metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4715 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The fetch function in OAuth/Curl.php in Dropbox-PHP, as used in ownCloud Server before 6.0.8, 7.x before 7.0.6, and 8.x before 8.0.4 when an external Dropbox storage has been mounted, allows remote administrators of Dropbox.com to read arbitrary files via an @ (at sign) character in unspecified POST values.

criterions.comment: php-dropbox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
